attributes.action: initiate an investigation into how Microsoft interacts with software markets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition the Prime Minister to initiate an investigation into how Microsoft interacts with software markets (in particular Operating Systems, Office Productivity).  We would like an assurance that Microsoft's majority share of these markets does not grant the company virtually unrestricted monopoly power over these markets.  We would also like assurances that the consumer would not be better served if these markets were such that no one company dominates.
